name: Adaptation Trial
description:
Survive in a harsh fast-changing islands, where the whole island and it’s habitants can quickly adapt through sharp weather fluctuations. Prepare yourself, craft items, gather food and water, collect resources, explore the islands in order to survive. Your goal is to survive as long as you can.

The game is free, but if you want for this game to develop further you can support me on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/RTSGames

And also any feedback or constructive opinions are welcome
